comments.body:
This should also check `server.flavor == cloudscale_test_flavor` to ensure the flavor is not changed in check mode.

This also applies to the other tests above if we keep the current behavior of the force parameter. But see my other comment on that.

comments.body: An additional test to change the server name would be nice. I don't think we need the full set of force yes/no check mode and idempotence tests here. IMO just one test with check mode yes and no would be enough. if you want to be fancy, add an idempotence test.
